original_text: But one day I will cause Moab to be strong again.’ That is what the Lord says. That is the end of the Lord's message against Moab. But one day I will cause Moab to be strong again.’ That is what the Lord says. That is the end of the Lord's message against Moab. But one day I will cause Moab to be strong again.’
korean_text: 그러나 내가 마지막 날에 모압의 포로를 돌려보내리라 여호와의 말씀이니라 모압의 심판이 여기까지니라

sentences.original_text: I will cause Moab to be strong again
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 모압을 다시 강하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
of the Lord's message against Moab
I will cause Moab to be strong again
